attributes.action: ensure that the Olympic logo is changed and the new one is put to a public vote.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo that has been produced for the 2012 games was a waste of £400k. There are many othe better submissions as we ask that it is put to a public vote as to what the new one should be.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
